title: Tough Old Bird Large T-Shirt Navy Blue, Novelty Gift Apparel

description: Tough Old Bird At Earth Sun Moon, we offer a wide variety of fun and quirky nature themed apparel. We take pride in producing high quality screen printed shirts in Grove City, PA. Our products make great gifts for the outdoor enthusiast in your life. Whether you are shopping for a good laugh, sage advice, or simply wearing your hobby on your sleeve (chest in this case), Earth Sun Moon has you covered. - As the saying goes, these are for nature lovers, by nature lovers. Tough Old Bird is printed on a unisex NAVY BLUE T-shirt S-XXL.
